SPEAKER: SPEAKERS
notice1: Around 30% of the talks will be conducted in Engish, real-time interpretation will not be available.
notice2: The deadline for registration is July 28, 2024(Sunday).The organizer may adjust the online registration period based on the remaining availability.
notice3: Pre-purchase and payment is required to attend the event, ticket refunds wll not be available.
notice4: For those who have completed ticket purchase and payment, click on "My Homepage(我的主頁)">"My Tickets(我的票券)" in the top right corner of the ticket platform, choose the session for this event, and a QR code will be displayed. Please present the QR code on the day of the event at check-in. An event badge and a merchandise voucher will be provided upon check-in.
notice5: For thoses who purchased exclusive event souvenirs, please redeem the merchandise on the day of the event (August 3rd, 2024) at the reception, using the merchandise voucher provided upon check-in.
notice6: If you have any questions related to ticket purchase, please email to us@dna.org.tw.
notice7: The organizer reserves the right to make final revisions, changes, interpretations of the event, and cancellations of Taiwan Digital Noman Conference 2024.

COC.title: CODE OF CONDUCT
COC.paragraph1: Participants in the Taiwan Digital Nomad Conference 2024 must work together to create a friendly environment free of harassment for all participants, regardless of their gender, sexual orientation, mental state, appearance, race, religious or political beliefs, or technological preferences.
COC.paragraph2: Any sexually explicit, violent or discriminatory language and/or imagery is inappropriate at any online or offline community event/space, including at seminars, speeches, gatherings, social media, chatrooms and even in documents.
COC.paragraph3: Speakers, sponsors, contributors, and conference volunteers are also considered participants and are thus subject to this code of conduct. If any participant violates this code, other attendees should take proactive measures to stop harassment or inappropriate behavior. Organizers and conference volunteers have the right to remove violators from the event, and participants are not obligated to refund or compensate any financial or resource investments made by expelled individuals (such as registration fees or donations).
COC.paragraph4: If you have been harassed or have discovered that others have been harassed, please immediately seek assistance from other participants, organizers and conference volunteers.

NEED HELP.title: NEED HELP?
NEED HELP.paragraph: If you run into any difficulties, please ask for help from the conference volunteers. If they are unable to help you, you can also contact us at us@dna.org.tw for assistance.

conf location: CHANG YUNG-FA FOUNDATION International Convention Center
TRANSPORTATION_TITLE: CHANG YUNG-FA FOUNDATION International Convention Center
TRANSPORTATION_ADDRESS: No. 11, Zhongshan S. Rd., Zhongzheng Dist., Taipei City, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
TRANSPORTATION_DESCRIPTION: CHANG YUNG-FA FOUNDATION International Convention Center is located on Zhongshan South Road, an easily accessible thoroughfare. The building faces the Ketagalan Boulevard and is close to the National Taiwan University Hospital and Liberty Square (Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall). It is a 5min walk from MRT National Taiwan University Hospital Station and a 5min drive from Taipei Main Station. There is an underground parking lot available for small and medium-sized cars.
conf description: is the inaugural annual event organized by the Taiwan Digital Nomad Association.  We create a space for domestic as well as international digital nomad enthusiasts to learn and network. We invite you to join us at the conference, where we can explore new opportunities and connect with like-minded individuals in the most relaxed but vibrant manner possible!
2024 is our 1st Digital Nomad Conference: 2024 marks our <1>1st</1> time hosting the Digital Nomad Summit.
We present non-stop exciting topics: Presenting an uninterrupted series of <1>11</1> exciting topics.
We have selected booths: <0>Plus, an additional showcase of</0> <1>6</1> selected booths on-site.
